### Advance Procurement Notice: Canada's Pavilion at the World Expo 2025 Osaka, Japan

**Reference Number**: WS3648974624-Doc3649027510
**Solicitation Number**: WS3648974624
**Publication Date**: September 6, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: November 16, 2022, at 14:00 ET
**Expected Contract Start Date**: October 31, 2022
**Expected Contract End Date**: December 6, 2022

**Notice Type**: Request for Information (RFI)

The Government of Canada, through the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development, is planning to host a pavilion at the World Expo 2025 in Osaka, Japan. The project will require the development, construction, fit-up, operation, maintenance, and dismantling of the Canada Pavilion and its content.

**Key Procurement Details**

* **Procurement Category**: Professional Services - Consulting Services
* **Method of Procurement**: Competitive – Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Not applicable
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Japan
* **Trade Agreements**: None
* **Procurement Description**: The Government of Canada is seeking professional services for the conception, development, construction, and management of the Canada Pavilion at the World Expo 2025 in Osaka, Japan.

**Background**

Canada has confirmed its participation in the World Expo 2025 in Osaka, Japan. The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development has the mandate to plan, coordinate, and implement this project.

**Key Project Requirements**

The successful contractor will be required to provide innovative and creative solutions, as well as solid management practices, to ensure Canada distinguishes itself in a highly competitive international environment. The contractor must have the necessary skills, experience, and licenses to undertake the work in Japan.

**Partner Opportunities**

The contractor is encouraged to consider partnering with other companies or forming joint ventures to deliver this prominent project. The ability to operate in both Canada and Japan is also essential.

**Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14275067](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14275067)

Please note that this is not a tender and a separate notice will be published once the tender is available. You can also visit the Government of Canada's procurement website for more information on this project.
